about_the_game:
Frigato: Shadows of the Caribbean official OST.

Dive into the vibrant, warming and relaxing vibes of Frigato: Shadows of the Caribbean and feel the inner pirate to rule the seas!

Listen to 10 songs (MP3 files) inspired by pirate conquests which should help you achieve the victories in Frigato video game! The Frigato: Shadows of the Caribbean official soundtrack will accompany you throughout the game for over 31 minutes.

Here is just a glimpse of what you can get:


Here is the full game

short_description: Music from first pirate real time tactics strategy game Frigato: Shadows of the Caribbean. It will put you in the mood of the pirate times. It's a good way to relax. As good in game as a standalone soundtrack. Enjoy!
